title: My Monster Farts
description: Short chapter book ideal for kids age 5 up to 8.Zach has a pet monster called Lenny. No one else can see or hear him.He loves Lenny but there is one big problem. Lenny loves to fart! He farts at home and at school and everyone thinks that it’s Zach.Zach is tired of getting in trouble because of Lenny’s farting.What will Zach do?
author: Kate Clary
